integration_issues.issue: Authentication redirect issue - page redirects to login instead of loading

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication routing issues for AdminPerksPage (/admin/perks) and AdminOperationsPanel (/admin/operations) - both pages redirect to login instead of loading. The issue appears to be related to AdminGuard authentication state management for these specific routes.
